p.k: Sports legend David Thompson at 6-foot-3 was the player who revolutionized "above the rim" basketball. Inventor of the "Alley Oop," conqueror
The Nuggets stunned the Sonics to win the deciding game in the 1st Round Series. It was the first time an 8 seed defeated a 1 seed in a Playoff series
David "Skywalker" Thompson lead all scorers with 31 points as the Nuggets defeat Bill Walton, 15 points and 14 rebounds, and the Trail Blazers 114-105
Jamal Murray scored a career-high 48 points, including 19 in the fourth quarter, and the Denver Nuggets overcame a sluggish start to beat the Boston Celtics 115-107

p.n: Centers of the Universe: Shaq & Yao
p.k: Every time they met on the court, it was a colossal event, Shaquille O'Neal and Yao Ming, two giants battling for supremacy in the league
Magic G Nick Anderson scored 50 points, despite coming off the bench, to help defeat the Nets. Magic C Shaquille O'Neal also broke the backboard
Shaquille O'Neal had 46 points and 20 rebounds and the Magic rallied from an 18 point deficit to take the Hornets into overtime
Magic C Dwight Howard and Timberwolves G Gerald Green compete in the Finals of the 2008 NBA Slam Dunk Contest from New Orleans
Dwight Howard dominated inside for 40 points, Rashard Lewis added 18 as the Magic defeated LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers in Game
When the horn sounded on their 116-108 win over the Celtics to clinch the Magic's first postseason berth since 2012, they took some extra
D.J. Augustin scored 25 points, including the tiebreaking 3-pointer with 3.5 seconds left, and the Magic beat the Toronto Raptors 104-101
Magic C. Shaquille O'Neal put the team on his back with 39 points to topple the pesky Pacers
Shaquille O'Neal and the up-and-coming Orlando Magic defeated Michael Jordan and the Bulls. This was Jordan's only Playoff Series loss between 1991 and 1998

p.n: USA White vs USA Blue (Las Vegas, Nevada)
p.k: The USA Basketball team, in preparation for the 2019 FIBA World Cup, will play an inter-squad exhibition game in Las Vegas. Players participating
